name: Target: Hive'Regal Ambushers
tooltip:
Target: Hive'Regal AmbushersLevel 60

Kill 30 Hive'Regal Ambushers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VIII in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Hive'Regal Ambusher x 30
